mapper.select: select id,trialDate,planPO,actualPO,pos,trialGroup,auxMaterial,fuel, gas,mainMaterial,power,spare, unit,place,startTime,endTime from p_trialProd where companyId = #{companyId} and projectId = #{query.projectId}

SELECT id,(CASE WHEN startTime IS NOT NULL AND endTime IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE ,startTime,endTime) ELSE 0 END) AS workHours, trialDate,startTime,endTime,unit,place,actualPO,planPO FROM p_trialProd where companyId=#{companyId} and projectId=#{projectId} and trialDate is not null order by trialDate

SELECT pt.id,(CASE WHEN pt.startTime IS NOT NULL AND pt.endTime IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE ,pt.startTime,pt.endTime) ELSE 0 END) AS `minute`, pt.trialDate,pt.startTime,pt.endTime,pt.unit,pt.deptName,pt.rdYield,pt.planYield,pdt.pdocFileId,pt.trialProduct,pt.selected FROM p_yield_config pt inner join p_docFile_trial pdt on pt.id=pdt.trialId where pt.companyId=#{companyId} and pt.projectId=#{projectId} and pdt.pdocFileId in ( #{docFileId}) order by pt.trialDate
select * from p_trialProd where companyId=#{companyId} and projectId=#{projectId}

SELECT pt.id,(CASE WHEN pt.startTime IS NOT NULL AND pt.endTime IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE ,pt.startTime,pt.endTime) ELSE 0 END) AS `minute`, pt.trialDate,pt.startTime,pt.endTime,pt.unit,pt.deptName,pt.rdYield,pt.planYield FROM p_yield_config pt where pt.projectId=#{projectId} and pt.companyId=#{companyId} order by pt.trialDate

SELECT id,(CASE WHEN startTime IS NOT NULL AND endTime IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE ,startTime,endTime) ELSE 0 END) AS `minute`, trialDate,startTime,endTime,unit,deptName,rdYield,planYield,trialProduct,selected FROM p_yield_config where companyId=#{companyId} and projectId=#{projectId} and `month`=#{month} order by trialDate

SELECT id,(CASE WHEN startTime IS NOT NULL AND endTime IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE ,startTime,endTime) ELSE 0 END) AS `minute`, trialDate,startTime,endTime,unit,deptName,rdYield,planYield,trialProduct FROM p_yield_config where companyId=#{companyId} and projectId=#{projectId} and `month`=#{month} and selected = 1 order by trialDate

SELECT id,(CASE WHEN startTime IS NOT NULL AND endTime IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE ,startTime,endTime) ELSE 0 END) AS `minute`, trialDate,startTime,endTime,unit,deptName,rdYield,planYield,`month` as trialMonth FROM p_yield_config where companyId=#{companyId} and projectId=#{projectId} and `month` in (#{month})
